message: Let's split fairly, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to end this quickly.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I believe a 55/45 split in my favor is more reflective of the situation.  The value of the money decreases for me each round, so I need a larger share upfront to make it worthwhile.
Bob, this is a negotiation. Your offer wasn't in good faith considering the inflation. I'm willing to meet closer to the middle, but I need you to do the same. 52/48 is my final offer.
